key_findings: split-rows reader, block-based tilize, CB c_0 input, CB c_16 output, TensorAccessor
WSmall pattern: bulk row load, reduce<MAX/SUM,REDUCE_ROW>, sub_bcast_cols, mul_bcast_cols, CB c_24-c_28 intermediates, WaitUpfrontNoPop
pack_untilize fast path, split-rows writer, stick-layout writes, block size optimization

question: rsqrt_tile availability and usage
findings: rsqrt_tile and rsqrt_tile_init available via compute_kernel_api/eltwise_unary/rsqrt.h, used in normalization kernels, takes dst_idx

question: add_tiles_bcast with BroadcastType::COL
findings: add_tiles_bcast_cols adds broadcast column to tile, C[h,w] = A[h,w] + B[h,0], init with add_bcast_cols_init_short

modifications: extended to read gamma/beta sticks and generate scaler/epsilon tiles
tilize input, layernorm math with reduce/sub/mul/square/rsqrt helpers, untilize output
split-rows writer for RM sticks, same pattern
